about_the_game:
A short demo for the game Gun to the Zone! This allows you to sample some of the activities available in the full game.

- Get a taste of the journey (the first campaign levels)
- Shoot the alien zombies in an arena
- Try the "onslaught" game mode - a relentless assault in outer space
- Earn some money and spend it on upgrades
- Level up (Demo is limited to level 10)


The full game has more levels and activities!
